TextView.android:text: 3-5x 5kg Muscle Ups
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
3x 2.5kg Muscle Ups ---> 3 Muscle Ups
x3-4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
1 Muscle Up ---> 5 Transitional Dips ---> 5x L-Sit Chin Ups
x5-7 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 Wall Handstand Push Ups ---> 10 Raised Pike Push Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 seconds L-Sit Hold ---> 10 Toes to Bar
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
7x 110kg Squats
x4-5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 90kg Squats ---> 10x 40kg Bulgarian Split Squats
x3-4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 50kg One-Legged Calf Raises ---> Max Glute Ham Raises
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
3-5x 40kg Pull Ups ---> 5 Muscle Ups
x4 Sets (3-4 mins rest inbetween sets)
4x 20kg Pull Ups + 20.20.20. Isometric Hold
x4-5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
15 Pull Ups
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
5 seconds Front Lever Hold with the Purple Resistance Band ---> 5 Dragon Flags
x4 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Front Lever Raises
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15x 20kg Back Extensions ---> 15 Back Extensions
x4 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
7 Dragon Flags (Slow Eccentric Decline on the last rep)
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
15-20 seconds L-Sit Hold
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
5 Toes to Bar ---> 10 Windshield Wipers
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
50 Sit Ups ---> 90 seconds Plank with 20kg
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
5x 40kg Dips ---> 4-5 Muscle Ups
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
10x 20kg Dips ---> 10 Russian Dips
x3 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max Wall Handstand Push Ups
x5 Sets (2-3 mins rest inbetween sets)
20 Ring Push Ups
x4 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 80kg Squats ---> Max Glute Ham Raises
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Max 60kg Squats ---> Max Glute Ham Raises
x5 Sets (3 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Intermediate Program Level 5 - Week 2
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE
There is no requirement to repeat this week's routine - however, it is highly encouraged since 5kg Muscle Ups are introduced for the first time.
